item.description:
Hello French Bulldog/Animal Lovers!

Are you looking to have fun and raise money for a great cause at the same time?

The Massachusetts Humane Society of Weymouth is holding a "Barktober/ Meowfest" Fundraiser on Saturday, October 18th at 7:00 pm to 12:00 am at the DAV Hall in Braintree.

The Mass Humane Society is a no-kill shelter in Weymouth that cares for homeless animals as well as finds them good homes. The shelter completely relies on volunteers and donations from the community to stay up and running.

The ticket fee for the fundraiser is $ 20.00 and you can purchase tickets ahead of time or at the door.

This event will include music , raffles, karaoke, games , buffet and fun! Plus, ALL Proceeds from this event will go to the animals in the shelter!

SO PLEASE, come out for a good cause ! PLEASE do it for our four-legged friends!

*****If you cannot make it, we are accepting donations, or for you WINE LOVERS please order a bottle of wine to benefit the MHS!****** Four GREAT wines for a GREAT cause!

You can choose from:

Rescue Me Red
Meow Merlot
Shelter Shardonnay
Samaritan Sparkling

OR buy a collector's package with all FOUR! A portion of the proceeds from each bottle go straight to the Mass Humane Society! Please visit : http://www.customgrap... to order your bottle of wine now!

If you would like to purchase tickets in advance, please the shelter at 781-335-1300 and leave a message or visit www.masshumane.org
item.how_to_find_us: This is not an organized meetup so have FUN!

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: "Barktober/ Meowfest" Fundraiser to benefit The MA Humane Society of Weymouth
